slide_intro.p: All sections of this activity are required for credit.
slide_intro.div:
Diagnostic and Management Challenges in Patients With Chronic Migraine Dr Lipton introduces this program on the management of patients with migraine.
Richard Lipton, MD

Stigma and Quality of Life in Patients With Frequent Migraine Dr Buse reviews data from the CaMEO study showing the effects of frequent migraine on patients and their families.
Dawn Buse, PhD

Considerations in Preventive Therapy for Migraine Dr Lipton discusses key issues facing clinicians when considering preventive treatment for patients with migraine.
Richard Lipton, MD

Migraine Headache: A Treatment Update Dr Dodick discusses the role of new and emerging options for the prevention and treatment of migraine.
David Dodick, MD

Emerging Approaches for Preventive Therapy of Chronic Migraine Dr Halker Singh reviews the most recent data on CGRP-targeting monoclonal antibodies for the prevention of chronic migraine.
Rashmi B. Halker Singh, MD
